activities: Huntingdon Life Sciences (HLS) is a Contract Research Organization that provides services to the pharmaceutical, biopharmaceutical and chemical industries.  In the course of doing business, HLS may collect and process data relating to study participants.  HLS may transfer data between member of the European Union and the United States.
personaldata: off line, online, manually processed data, human resources data
recoursemech: EU data protection authorities and Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner
